Text: Anubi le̩ ge̩, e̩gba kʼame̩ rʼanya ku me̩ fʼane̩ le̩ kpe̩jo̩ ki mud e̩wñ ogu, ame̩ adʼukpe̩ʼka ko ne ñwu Jihofa, owñ chʼukpe̩ ane̩ kiafo̩. Ujiji-wñ la chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩lu, unabe̩-wñ la ache icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa. Ugbo du gbogbo kad alo̩me̩-wñ daka afo̩.
Ef e-le̩ uña ade̩ tod uña kiafo̩ le̩, ujiji-wñ achʼe̩ñwa oli me̩gwa, unabe̩-wñ laño̩ chʼoli me̩gwa ge̩. Ago̩go̩ me̩le̩ i ache; o̩hibo̩wo̩ ooje atane̩ ofo lʼo daka.
Ef e-kʼe̩ ñwa le̩ uwe̩ añwa ujiji-wñ ki chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩lu, kpʼunabe̩-wñ ki chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa. Ef e-le̩ oñ uña kiafo̩ ade̩, owñ chʼelo̩ e-efo̩.

E-le̩ chʼukpe̩ ane̩ le̩ kiafo̩; i achʼutodu amatama, ku ma chʼabo ku ma che e̩wñ ef uña kiafo̩, ku ma te̩me̩rʼu ku ma che e̩wñ ñwu Jihofa; e-le̩ achʼugbokʼunyi-maajo̩, kpʼugbo kiafo̩ tod uña kiafo̩ le̩.
Oñ e-kʼujiji-wñ chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩lu, kʼunabe̩-wñ chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa, abo Lifai, ku ma che e̩wñ unyi le̩ ane̩ kʼi chʼugbo ku ma adodo.

Tak ame̩ adʼukpe̩ ane̩ te̩ kʼewo le̩ ki ne̩; unabe̩-wñ le̩ chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩lu, ujiji-wñ la chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩lu. Akolo-wñ akad ako-lo ukpe̩ ane̩ kiafo̩ ku ma ko ne ñw O̩jo̩ le̩ gbogbo wa tʼane̩-wñ; e-le̩ achʼutodu o̩gbo abo unyi Israe̩l chaka.

Idachi le̩ anʼukpe̩ e-wñ o̩wo̩ʼka kpʼo̩wo̩ ekeji e-kiafo̩ ku ma ko ne ñw O̩jo̩ le, kpʼe-kʼewo le̩ ne̩; i akad e-kiafo̩ ku ma ko ne ñw O̩jo̩ kpʼe-kʼewo le̩ ne̩, akwʼo̩wo̩ olane̩-wñ ale rʼo̩wo̩ olane̩, kpʼakwʼo̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ ale rʼo̩wo̩ olodudu. Ujiji-wñ le̩ adʼalu kʼujiji ukpe̩ʼka-wñ de̩, akwʼalo̩me̩-wñ o̩wo̩ olane̩ gbogbo wʼalo̩me̩-wñ o̩wo̩ olodudu.
I ane̩ e-le̩ kʼi achʼane̩-wñ kʼi ane̩ oj ane̩ Israe̩l. Amidachi-mi ñʼatʼabo-mi mane̩ ge̩ n; ma la akʼane̩-i ñw abo unyi Israe̩l teju alu kʼo̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu-ma ade̩.

AbukʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩, kakini, I ki bʼume̩ jo̩, O ame̩ amidachi Israe̩l! Mʼe̩wñ afuma kpʼe̩wñ aluje̩ ko̩, ku me̩ che teju alu kʼoji ajo̩ ka kpʼo̩kpakpa; mʼone̩ ene-me̩ du bʼabo-mi te̩, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
E̩bo̩ uñwʼe̩wñ-me̩ ki chʼo̩kpakpa, kpʼefa o̩kpakpa kpʼibat o̩kpakpa.
E̩fa kpai ibati ki nʼe̩ñwa okujo̩, ibati le̩ ki je̩ ukpe̩re̩gwa homaʼka, kʼe̩fa ki ño̩ chʼe̩kpe̩re̩gwa homa ge̩; e̩ñwa-wñ ki dʼalu kʼe-homa de̩.
She̩ke̩l oka la ache gera ogu; she̩ke̩l ogu, she̩ke̩l ogue̩lu, kpai she̩ke̩l me̩gwe̩lu ache mane̩-me̩.
E̩wñ eko ne ate̩ ku me̩ ako wa le̩ de̩: e̩kpe̩re̩fa e̩faʼka ku ma bu kwef homa witʼka; me̩ ñʼad e̩kpe̩re̩fa e̩faʼka kwef homa barliʼka ge̩;
kpai ukpe̩ ekpo alu ku ma da kwef ibat ekpoʼka; e̩kpe̩re̩gwa ibat oka ki kwef ko̩r oka; ibati me̩gwa che ko̩r oka, i ño̩ che homaʼka ge̩,

kpai e̩wño̩re̩ eginiʼka kwef ame̩wño̩re̩ egini o̩gwo̩ko̩, i ki kwef o̩gwo̩ko̩ ki jʼokije̩ Israe̩l ki nʼomi nyo̩nyo̩; e-le̩ ki chʼutodu e̩wñ ele, kpʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, kpʼiche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩, todu ku ma ki che e̩wñ e̩boma todu ma, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Amone̩ ane̩-i du akʼe̩wñ wa tod e̩wñ eko nyʼate̩ todu idachi kʼi dʼIsrae̩l.

Oñ i adukpe̩ kʼidachi le̩ ki kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, kpʼe̩wñ ele, kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ omi wa, ef uje̩wñ uyo̩-ma, kpʼiko ochu etito̩, kpʼo̩jo̩ uñmi o̩jo̩ uñmi, kpʼe̩gba kʼiko du kʼo̩jo̩ uje̩wñ ku ma date̩ ñw abo unyi Israe̩l jo̩; owñ le̩ añwʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure kpʼe̩wñ ele kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ che, kʼi che e̩wñ e̩boma tod abo unyi Israe̩l.
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Ochu ejodudu, o̩jo̩ ejodudu ochu le̩, uwe̩ ki mʼo̩mʼo̩kokuno̩ ki ma nʼe̩nyo̩lo̩ n du, kʼuwe̩ ki fʼuña kiafo̩ le̩ gworinyo̩.
Tak atama ache e̩bie̩ e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure kʼi adʼu kad oli alo̩na unyi-i o̩wo̩ meji-wñ, kpʼalo e̩bale ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ me̩le̩, kpʼoli alo̩na anuku.
Abe̩le̩ uwe̩ ache o̩jo̩ e̩kebie ochu le̩ tod e̩ne̩ du kʼi la, kpai tod e̩nemo̩, abe̩le̩ oñ ame̩ ache e̩wñ e̩boma tod unyi-i.
Ochu ejodudu, o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩le̩ ochu le̩, ame̩ aje̩ E̩laloji, uje̩wñ uyo̩-wñ chʼo̩jo̩ mebie; uje̩wñ ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu n oñ ame̩ aje̩.
O̩jo̩ e-le̩ idachi añwʼo̩kokuno̩ che kʼi mud e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure tod o̩la-wñ kpai todu amone̩ oj ane̩-i chaka.

O̩jo̩ okoke o̩jo̩ mebie le̩ i añwʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo che ñwu Jihofa, o̩kokuno̩ mebie kpʼokolo mebie ku ma ma nʼe̩nyo̩lo̩ n i ako wa che o̩jo̩ mebie le̩ okoke du, kpʼo̩mobuko̩ tod e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure o̩jo̩ du.
I la añwʼe̩wñ ele che, e̩fa-wñʼka chʼutodu o̩kokuno̩ʼka, kpʼe̩faʼka tod okoloʼka, e̩fa omuʼka ane̩ hin ekpoʼka.

Ochu e̩kebie, o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩lu ochu le̩, e̩gba uje̩wñ uyo̩ le̩, i ñʼache abe̩le̩ o̩jo̩ o̩koke-wñ mebie ge̩; alu kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure de̩, kpʼalu kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo de̩, kpʼalu kʼe̩wñ ele de̩, kpʼalu kʼekpo-wñ de̩.
